item.description:
This is an attempt to work on a monthly, or potentially bi-weekly poker night for those that might be interested.  For clarity, this is a poker night, not a "cards" night, potentially playing a basic draw poker or, for those that this appeals to, Texas Hold'em.

Currently, this isn't a play for money, just chips, I have chips to play with.  Eventually, as this becomes a regular event, we can switch to some kind of cash stakes.  No guarantees, keep in mind this is for fun and entertainment.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my house number the day before to anyone who has RSVPed Yes and does not already have it.
item.name: Poker Night
